rules.natural: Either sea level rise occurs in the coastal region or glacier retreat occurs in the mountain region.
Provided that coastal protection is implemented through the infrastructure, whenever ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem, coral bleaching occurs in the reef.

Under the condition that government funding is provided to the project, either marine conservation is implemented in the protected area or coastal protection is implemented through the infrastructure.
Either government funding is provided to the project or private investment is made in the initiative.
Provided that a research grant is awarded for the study, then either marine conservation is implemented in the protected area or coastal protection is implemented through the infrastructure.
If an international treaty is established as the agreement, then under the condition that private investment is made in the initiative, a research grant is awarded for the study.
Either an international treaty is established as the agreement or a local policy is enacted as the regulation.
Whenever a local policy is enacted as the regulation, if private investment is made in the initiative, then a research grant is awarded for the study.
Either an environmental lawsuit is filed against the company or a regulatory fine is imposed on the organization.
If a regulatory fine is imposed on the organization, then a pollution event does not occur in the industrial zone.
Under the condition that a compliance requirement is imposed on the business, a pollution event does not hold in the industrial zone.
If glacier retreat occurs in the mountain region, then a climate impact assessment is conducted for the region.

Provided that an environmental group exists as the NGO, if it is not the case that an environmental lawsuit filed against the company leads to a compliance requirement imposed on the business, then a legal appeal is filed in the court.
Either an environmental group exists as the NGO or a community organization exists as the coalition.

If a community organization exists as the coalition, then under the condition that it is not the case that an environmental lawsuit filed against the company results in a compliance requirement imposed on the business, a legal appeal is filed in the court.
Whenever industrial emission occurs from the factory, a pollution event occurs in the industrial zone.
Either industrial emission occurs from the factory or if sea level rise occurs in the coastal region, then a climate impact assessment is conducted for the region.
Provided that carbon capture is implemented through the technology, industrial emission does not occur from the factory.
If renewable energy adoption occurs in the region, then industrial emission does not hold from the factory.
Either deforestation activity occurs in the forest, or carbon capture is implemented through the technology, or renewable energy adoption occurs in the region.
If ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem, then it is not the case that coral bleaching occurs in the reef.
Either ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem or a climate impact assessment is conducted for the region.
Under the condition that marine conservation is implemented in the protected area, if ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem, then coral bleaching occurs in the reef.
If it is not the case that an environmental lawsuit filed against the company results in a compliance requirement imposed on the business, then a legal appeal is not filed in the court.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either sea level rise occurs in the coastal region or glacier retreat occurs in the mountain region.

(A10 → (A7 → A8)).natural: Provided that coastal protection is implemented through the infrastructure, whenever ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem, coral bleaching occurs in the reef.

(A13 → (A9 ∨ A10)).natural: Provided that a research grant is awarded for the study, then either marine conservation is implemented in the protected area or coastal protection is implemented through the infrastructure.

(A14 ∨ A15).natural: Either an international treaty is established as the agreement or a local policy is enacted as the regulation.

(A19 → ¬A16).natural: Under the condition that a compliance requirement is imposed on the business, a pollution event does not hold in the industrial zone.

(A2 → G).natural: If glacier retreat occurs in the mountain region, then a climate impact assessment is conducted for the region.

(A21 → (¬(A17 → A19) → A20)).natural: Provided that an environmental group exists as the NGO, if it is not the case that an environmental lawsuit filed against the company leads to a compliance requirement imposed on the business, then a legal appeal is filed in the court.

(A21 ∨ A22).natural: Either an environmental group exists as the NGO or a community organization exists as the coalition.

(A3 → A16).natural: Whenever industrial emission occurs from the factory, a pollution event occurs in the industrial zone.

(A6 ∨ (A4 ∨ A5)).natural: Either deforestation activity occurs in the forest, or carbon capture is implemented through the technology, or renewable energy adoption occurs in the region.

(A7 → A8).natural: Whenever ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem, coral bleaching occurs in the reef.

(A7 → ¬A8).natural: If ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem, then it is not the case that coral bleaching occurs in the reef.

(A7 ∨ G).natural: Either ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem or a climate impact assessment is conducted for the region.

(A9 → (A7 → A8)).natural: Under the condition that marine conservation is implemented in the protected area, if ocean acidification occurs in the marine ecosystem, then coral bleaching occurs in the reef.
